content.title: See What People Said About the MinVerse at CES 2025! (+ accessibility, bulk orders & behind-the-scenes progress)
content.creator:
Haply Robotics Inc.
February 21, 2025
content.content:
Hey everyone!
We’ve been hard at work and wanted to share a few quick but exciting updates with you:
We’ve added alt text throughout the campaign page to make our content more accessible to all.
Due to the interest in our expired bulk order tiers, we’re introducing a 10x MinVerse pack at 50% off for those looking to equip an entire team.
We’re deep into software development and refining integrations. If you want more frequent behind-the-scenes updates, be sure to follow our socials! We’re also working on the manufacturing plan to ensure a smooth production process.
Check Out Our CES 2025 Reactions! 🤩
We recently showcased the MinVerse at CES 2025, and the reactions were incredible! From product designers to engineers, everyone was blown away by the precision and realism of our haptic technology. 
Thanks for all your continued support - we’ll be back with more updates soon! Let us know in the comments what you’re most excited about.
– The Haply Team

comments.text: Hello, Thank you for trying to make the content more accessible. As a fully blind person using screen, reader software, I am deeply dependent on accessibility. However, I just scrolled down through your campaign section using my phone, and unfortunately, still nothing is being read aloud. I know this because I had my girlfriend read everything for me yesterday. Please, I really hope you will keep trying to improve accessibility. Thank you.

Hey Edis, Thank you so much for your feedback and patience, and we're really sorry its not working for you. We are now checking with Kickstarter to understand why this is the case, as we've added the alt text on our side and we'll reach back out when it's solved. Thank you for understanding.

content.title: From Launch to 200% Funded – The Journey So Far
content.creator:
Haply Robotics Inc.
February 14, 2025
content.content:
Hi everyone,
First off, we want to say a huge thank you for your patience and support. Some of you have reached out about the lack of updates, and we completely understand. This being our first campaign, we weren’t familiar with how often we should be sending these out, but we’re here now and will make sure to keep you informed!
The Moment We Hit "Launch"  🚀
We’ll never forget the moment we hit that green "Launch" button. Months of late nights, testing, refining, and dreaming about this product had built up to that single click. It was equal parts exhilarating and terrifying. Within minutes, we saw the first backers roll in, and that’s when it really sank in: people believe in this vision just as much as we do.
We knew it was time to bring this idea to Kickstarter when we realized how much impact this product could have - not just for us, but for so many creators, gamers, and makers. The world of 3D interaction is evolving, and we wanted to be at the forefront, building something that truly enhances the way people create and explore. Kickstarter wasn’t just a way to fund the project, it was a way to build a community of people who share that vision.
Some Incredible Milestones We’ve Hit  🎯
Since launching just over two weeks ago, we’ve been completely blown away by the response. Here’s what we’ve achieved together so far:
✅  50% funded in the first 2 hours
✅  100% funded in the first 2 days
✅  $100k+ raised in the first week
✅  Selected as a Kickstarter 'Project We Love'
✅  Now at 200%+ funded and still growing!
None of this would have been possible without YOU. Your enthusiasm, trust, and support mean everything to us. Thank you for believing in this project.
Where We’re At Today  🔧
Campaign Updates: We’re working on adding more accessories/add-ons and sharing even more reactions from people trying out the MinVerse.
Software Development: We’re deep in the development of the applications and software integrations - stay tuned for updates!
Community Input: We’re actively posting on social media and online forums, exploring different interaction styles and features. If you haven’t joined the conversation yet, we’d love your input!
What’s Next?  👀
We’ll be sending out regular updates moving forward to keep you in the loop. In the meantime, keep an eye on our social channels, and feel free to reach out with any questions or feedback!
Thank you for being part of this journey!
The Haply Team
